meanings.sent1: After fixing the issue, the technician will reservice the equipment.

meanings.definition: To renew or refresh a service.
meanings.sent1: The hotel will reservice the rooms before the new guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: It's time to reservice the website to attract more visitors.
